title: Failed to load a user's dashboard page
content:
When an agent user clicks My Dashboards > Dashboard, the following error message occurs:

The system failed to load your dashboard page because of an error. Contact your administrator.

Cause

This error occurs because the user has no default dashboard explicitly defined in the Default dashboard field either in the user's Person record or in the user's profile, so the system should load the system default dashboard for the user; however, there's more than one system default dashboard found in the system, and hence the error occurs. 

Note It's impossible to set more than one system default dashboard by using the Set as system default button; however, it's possible to do this through a Mass Update or through a REST call. 

Solution

The tenant admin must cancel unwanted system default dashboards, and make sure that the system has only one system default dashboard:

  1. Log in to the agent interface as the tenant admin.
  2. Navigate to Administration > Master Data > Deshboard Definitions.
  3. Add the System default dashboard field to the grid view if it's not available.
  4. Cancel unwanted system default dashboards so that the system has only system default dashboards. To cancel an unwanted system default dashboard, open the record and then uncheck the System default dashboard check box.
